dcterms:description: A benchmark dataset containing 150,000 game footage frames from three different 3D games: ViZDoom, CARLA, and Google Research Football Environment, used for evaluating self-supervised learning methods in state representation learning.
dcterms:title: 3D-SSL Benchmark Dataset

dcterms:description: A Doom-based AI research platform for visual reinforcement learning, providing a framework for training agents in a first-person shooter environment.
dcterms:title: ViZDoom

dcterms:description: An open-source simulator for autonomous driving research, providing a realistic urban driving environment for testing and training self-driving algorithms.

dcterms:description: A novel reinforcement learning environment designed for training agents in a football simulation, providing a realistic setting for multi-agent interactions.
dcterms:title: Google Research Football Environment (GRFE)
